task.title: Invite a User to Create a Studio Account
task.shortdesc: Studio Managers and Administrators can invite new or existing users to create a Studio account.

context.p: The Livefyre Technical Account Manager for your network sends the first Studio account invitation to create a Studio Administrator account. You provide an email address that the Livefyre Technical Account Manager uses to create the Studio Administrator account.
context.note: When inviting others to join Studio, you create accounts with permission levels equal to or less than your own.
You can grant multiple user roles to a single user. See User Roles and Permissions for more information on what user roles and permissions you can grant.

step.cmd: From the Users page, click Invite to Studio.
From the Invite user dialog that opens, select Existing User or New User.
To invite an existing user, enter a Username, User ID, or Email Address in the fields provided. To invite a new user, enter an Email address.
Click Add message to enter a personalized invitation, if desired.
Select the access level for the new Account, and click Invite to issue the invitation.
